title: Woman's bag
description: red, orange, blue cotton embroidery (cross stitch) on black cotton ground; wool pom-poms on three sides; metallic, half-round discs near bottom sides; twisted black and white seed fringe, bottom sides; black sides form shoulder strap; lined in tan; indigo reverse
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
